Students M obile
SM -81A bout U s
Designed for focus. Built for growth. 
Trusted by parents.Sudhan M obiles SG Founded in 2025 by Sudhan Ponnuthurai, a
mobile industry expert with over a decade of
experience, Sudhan Mobiles was created to
solve a growing problem — kids being
consumed by smartphones.
Seeing how endless scrolling and social media
were harming focus, Sudhan set out to build
something different: a safe, distraction-free
phone for students.
The result? The Students Mobile SM81 — no
social media, no video platforms, just essential
tools and brain-boosting games.
Based in Singapore, we’re proud to empower
families, educators, and schools with tools that
support young minds — not distract them.
Because we believe focus is freedom.
Scan here 

Too Many Distractions, 
Too Little Focus
Social media. Endless videos. Uncontrolled
screen time.
Today’s smartphones weren’t made for
students — they’re made to grab attention.
That’s why the Students Mobile SM81 
comes in.
We help parents, educators, and coaching
centers protect young minds from
distractions and unlock focused learning
through responsible technology.Built for Students
Trusted by Parents
Parents stay in control with built-in 
screen time toolsParental Control 
Intuitive for kids.
